long_description: Dip into this women's prAna chalk bag to keep your hands dry and grippy while working a difficult climbing route. Recycled polyester exterior features a fleece-lined chalk reservoir that holds plenty of powder. Drawcord closure keeps chalk from spilling out while not in use. Elastic loop holds a brush for cleaning off holds. This prAna chalk bag comes with a nylon webbing belt that adjusts easily.
short_description: Dip into this women's prAna chalk bag to keep your hands dry and grippy while working a difficult climbing route.
